trans-unit.source: Enables collections to have the functionalities of current record management, custom sorting, filtering, and grouping.

The interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> class, which is the base class for <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.
Gets a value that indicates whether this view supports filtering via the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.Filter*> property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this view support filtering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether this view supports grouping via the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.GroupDescriptions*> property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this view supports grouping; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether this view supports sorting via the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.SortDescriptions*> property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this view supports sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether a given item belongs to this collection view.
This method does not make any assumptions about whether the item belongs to the underlying collection.
The object to check.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item belongs to this collection view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the cultural info for any operations of the view that may differ by culture, such as sorting.
The culture to use during sorting.
When implementing this interface, raise this event after the current item has been changed.

Classes that are implementing this interface should raise the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging> event and check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property value before changing the currency and raising CurrentChanged event.
To be added.
When implementing this interface, raise this event before changing the current item.
Event handler can cancel this event.

Classes that are implementing this interface should raise the CurrentChanging event and check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property value before changing the currency and raising <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged> event.
To be added.
Gets the current item in the view.
The current item of the view or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no current item.
Gets the ordinal position of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> within the view.
The ordinal position of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> within the view.
Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.
An <xref:System.IDisposable> object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.
Gets or sets a callback used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
A method used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref> objects that describe how the items in the collection are grouped in the view.
A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref> objects that describe how the items in the collection are grouped in the view.
Gets the top-level groups.
A read-only collection of the top-level groups or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no groups.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> of the view is beyond the end of the collection.

Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> of the view is beyond the end of the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> of the view is beyond the beginning of the collection.

Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> of the view is beyond the beginning of the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the resulting view is empty.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting view is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Sets the specified item to be the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> in the view.
The item to set as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Sets the first item in the view as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is an item within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Sets the last item in the view as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is an item within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Sets the item after the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> in the view as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is an item within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Sets the item at the specified index to be the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> in the view.
The index to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> to.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is an item within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Sets the item before the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> in the view as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem*> is an item within the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Recreates the view.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects that describe how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.
A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects that describe how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.
Returns the underlying collection.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object that is the underlying collection.
